name: Wanted (Veralos)
description:
Overview

Play as a bounty hunter and track down bandits in this vaguely gameboy styled wild west metroidvania.

Controls Keyboard
  • Move: Directional keys
  • Jump: Z/W/Y
  • Shoot: X
  • View map: Space
Gamepad
  • Move: D-pad
  • Jump: A
  • Shoot X/B
  • View map: Start
  • Use elevator
Other
  • Toggle fullscreen: Alt + Enter
